General.Name: Shenzhen Phoenix Telecom Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Shenzhen Phoenix Telecom Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, manufacturing, and sale of data communication equipment. It offers Ethernet switches, routers, wireless terminals, EoC, and access network products. It serves education, finance, transportation, and power energy businesses; enterprises, hotel venues, Internet systems, telecommunications operators, and radio and television operators; and government offices. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.
